author: Kenny L.

changelog.release_notes:
Fixed problem with having random team chosen and auto updates (it will not update information for your randomly selected team).
Added indicator for bye, as well as now randomly selecting a "team to beat" and setting countdown (if chosen) to default.
Also fixed some stability issues (though there is sometimes some trouble.  If the logo isn't showing up, simply change the screen [aka look at timeline or your app list] and it should go back to working just fine!)

Removed crashes (I hope!)
More frequent updates when a game is being played
Minor edits

MAJOR UPDATE!
New Features:
-Current Weather - and choose to use Weather Underground for tighter control
-AUTOMATIC NFL INFORMATION!!! - Allow the watch to automatically pull what team your favorite is playing this week!  It can also pull the gametime automatically to count down to, and it'll even show the current score if it's available!

Cleaned Features:
-Minor Text fixes
-Cleaner settings page
-Smarter code
-All around better

Features to come:
-More frequent updates when a game is being played (right now updates are locked into weather updates - so if you aren't using Weather Underground that's hourly)
-Weather at game site
-Weather forecasts
-Timeline pins
Moved text layers so they do not appear in the wrong spot with peak.
Added Diorite Support and peak support
Initial release.  See NCAA FBS Watchface for previous version information.

description:
Support your favorite NFL team with this watchface!  It includes every team some extra options! Show your pride and remind yourself which team sucks this week!

Premium version: $1 (or $1.50 bundle which includes the D1 NCAA FBS Watchface premium) (or $3.00 bundle which includes the NFL Watchface, NHL Watchface [Coming Soon], and MLB Watchface [Coming Soon] premium) includes a gameday countdown, health data, weather, and a random team selection option!

Teams Included:
Buffalo Bills,
Miami Dolphins,
New England Patriots,
New York Jets,
Baltimore Ravens,
Cincinnati Bengals,
Cleveland Browns,
Pittsburgh Steelers,
Houston Texans,
Indianapolis Colts,
Jacksonville Jaguars,
Tennessee Titans,
Denver Broncos,
Kansas City Chiefs,
Oakland Raiders,
San Diego Chargers,
Dallas Cowboys,
New York Giants,
Philadelphia Eagles,
Washington Redskins,
Chicago Bears,
Detroit Lions,
Green Bay Packers,
Minnesota Vikings,
Atlanta Falcons,
Carolina Panthers,
New Orleans Saints,
Tampa Bay Buccaneers,
Arizona Cardinals,
Los Angeles Rams,
San Francisco 49ers,
Seattle Seahawks

*This watch face is for entertainment purposes only. NFL and team logos are property of their respective owners.
title: NFL Watchface
